description: The Buzz (Jack "JJ" Jameson) is a fictional character in the Spider-Girl comic book series, published by Marvel Comics. JJ is the grandson of J. Jonah Jameson and the son of John Jameson. His costume bears some similarities to Henry Pym's Yellowjacket suit.
name: Buzz
powers: Gauntlets that fire electric blasts or streamers of sticky adhesive
